lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Administration officials, including Commerce Secretary Malcolm Baldrige and Defense Secretary Caspar Weinberger, feared that the sale to Fujitsu would lead to Japanese control of key semiconductor technology for supercomputers and military weapons systems.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Among the companies that would be interested in bidding for Fairchild are Advanced Micro Devices <AMD>, Sunnyvale, Calif., and LSI Logic Corp <LLSI>, Milpitas, Calif., industry analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. chipmakers like National Semiconductor Corp <NSM>, Texas Instruments Inc <TXN> and Motorola Inc <MOT> might also seek to buy Fairchild, but could possibly run into antitrust problems, the analysts added.
